mapper.sql: ID = #{id}, BILLNO = #{billno}, FEE_TYPE = #{feeType}, FEE_SOURCE = #{feeSource}, BUSINESS_CODE = #{businessCode}, BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName}, COMPANY = #{company}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus}, IS_SEND_GX = #{isSendGx}, VALID_STATUS = #{validStatus}, MAX_BILL_FEE = #{maxBillFee}, BILL_FEE = #{billFee}, SETTLE_TIMES = #{settleTimes}, ACTUAL_TURNOVER_COUNT = #{actualTurnoverCount}, ESTIMATE_TURNOVER_COUNT = #{estimateTurnoverCount}, FEEOWNER = #{feeowner}, REMARK = #{remark}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, CREATOR = #{creator}, MODIFIER = #{modifier}, FLAG = #{flag}, FLOW_ID = #{flowId}, REVIEW_STATUS = #{reviewStatus}, REVIEW_TYPE = #{reviewType}, MATCH_ID = #{matchId}, REACH_RATE = #{reachRate}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode}, AREA_NAME = #{areaName}, BRANDS_CODE = #{brandsCode}, BRANDS_NAME = #{brandsName}, ACTIVE_STARTIME = #{activeStartime}, ACTIVE_ENDTIME = #{activeEndtime}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creatorName}, FOUNDER_LEVEL = #{founderLevel}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, BILLNO, FEE_TYPE, FEE_SOURCE, BUSINESS_CODE, BUSINESS_NAME, COMPANY, BILL_STATUS, IS_SEND_GX, VALID_STATUS, MAX_BILL_FEE, BILL_FEE, SETTLE_TIMES, ACTUAL_TURNOVER_COUNT, ESTIMATE_TURNOVER_COUNT, FLOW_ID, FEEOWNER, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, START_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, FLAG, REVIEW_STATUS, REVIEW_TYPE, Match_ID REACH_RATE, AREA_CODE, AREA_NAME, BRANDS_CODE, BRANDS_NAME, ACTIVE_STARTIME, ACTIVE_ENDTIME, CREATOR_NAME, FOUNDER_LEVEL FROM MKMM_FEE_MAIN_REVIEW
mapper.delete:

#{arr}

delete from MKMM_FEE_MAIN_REVIEW where id in
#{ids}
mapper.update: update MKMM_FEE_MAIN_HIS a set a.flag = '0' where a.BUSINESS_CODE = #{businessCode} and a.COMPANY = #{company} and a.FEE_TYPE = '01' and a.FEE_SOURCE = '01' and a.bill_status = '04' and a.id = ( SELECT max(id) from MKMM_FEE_MAIN_HIS b where a.BUSINESS_CODE = b.BUSINESS_CODE )
